summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4663 for the improvement of the alley in block B, Bell & Denny's 3rd Addition, being the alley between 3rd Avenue and 4th Avenue, from Blanchard Street to Bell Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54092, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
